Machine Learning and Data Mining Lecture Notes

This document provides lecture notes on machine learning and data mining, covering topics such as linear regression, nonlinear regression, quadratics, basic probability theory, and more. It includes explanations of various concepts, examples, and exercises to help students understand the material.

Key Concepts:

  • Types of Machine Learning
  • Simple problem in Machine Learning
  • Linear Regression in one dimension
  • Multidimensional inputs and outputs in Linear Regression
  • Overfitting and Regularization in Nonlinear Regression
  • Artificial Neural Networks as a type of Nonlinear Regression
  • A method for finding the maximum or minimum of a function subject to equality and inequality constraints.
  • A technique for dimensionality reduction that minimizes the sum of squared errors between data points and their projections.
  • The process of imposing multiple constraints on an optimization problem.
  • The consideration of inequality constraints in optimization problems.
